page.title: 16RELIGION CONTINUED
page.content:
ST NICHOLAS - Lillingstone Dayrell re- corded in the Domesday Book is a tour- ist attraction set in parkland. The Dayrell family are remembered in monu- ments and brasses dating from 1491. Services are 2/3 times a month, few attend - Charmandean Girls' School are the mainstay. Each church has a Dis- trict Church Council and is represen- ted on the Parochial CC.
AKELEY CHURCH CHARITIES - George Wards For the benefit of the poor of the par- ish over 60 years. Sir W Smith bene- fitting deserving locals. Poor's Allotment for general benefit of poor. Claimants must have lived in the parish for at least 3 years. They apply to the charity secretary and monies are distributed mid-December.
